# lastEventTimestamp

**Instance Property**

The time of the most recent event.

## Declaration

```swift
var lastEventTimestamp: TimeInterval { get }
```

## Discussion

This property isn’t relative to any specific date and time. To determine the time between events, subtract a previous value of this property from the current value. You can also compare [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCDevicePhysicalInputState/lastEventTimestamp] properties of two different devices to determine which event occurs first.

## Getting change information

- **lastEventLatency**: The time in seconds between the last event and the current time.
